ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes - you'll learn stuff you won't learn in other bio classes. very application-based. Definitely take it
This class was not the most challenging that I've taken, but it was really interesting, enjoyable, and helpful.

MCDB 570 examines biotechnology techniques from those that are used everyday in the lab to those that are only used in highly specialized labs. The course begins with descriptions of processes that are widely used and then ends with detailed applications and descriptions of specialized techniques. I would recommend this course to another student because it provides information on techniques that are applicable to many portions of modern biology that are studied.
Yes. It is a good survey of biotechnology.
If you are interested in the material then yes. I would recommend having a deeper grasp of genetics and biochem than I did coming in to get the most out the class.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It serves as a good introduction to basic biology.
Did not know much about gene therapy before - now i do. Learned about current breakthroughs and technology. Learned a lot from the papers we read.

Though I was already familiar with some of the topics, I am leaving this class knowing much more about topics I was unfamiliar with. Due to the focus on teaching relevant research ideas and techniques, I am sure that this class will prove to be helpful in the future.

This course deepened my knowledge in regards to my discipline because it went into detail about common biotechnology techniques that may be used in different disciplines of biology. The same can be said for helping my research. My research was improved with the knowledge of various techniques learned through this course.
gave some good detailand background I would otherwise not get
Gave me a lot of ideas for research!
